thread.title: Jo Cleary
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Jo Cleary

author: Jo Cleary
title: Jo Cleary
text: I will continue to use this company. Very reliable and were able to sort out problems easily. I ended up paying for a handle that had fallen off but that was fiats fault and they matched the price that fiat would have charged me and the full service and mot are much cheaper than anywhere i have found. They are dropping the car back tomorrow. I find all of their staff very helpful and understanding. They are good at resolving any issues that arrive
